DOC.detailed_description: This retrospective database study quantify burden multiple mild pre-defined influenza-attributable outcome interest , result physician office visit person le 65 year age , United States relevant Marketscan Commercial database period July 2000 April 2009 , October 2010 May 2011 . The corresponding physician office visit person 65 year age old , mild influenza-attributable outcome interest , United States record relevant MarketScan Medicare Supplemental database period July 2006 April 2009 , October 2010 May 2011 also investigate . The period April 2009 September 2010 exclude avoid H1N1 pandemic wave .
